name: SUMO (itch)
description:
An archaeologist discovers an ancient weapon, the Gauntlet. It holds an immense power for those who are worthy, but at what price does it come with? 

SUMO is a retro-style survival fps game in the underworld where all beings are immortal except to the darkness of the abyss below. You nor your enemies don't have health so you must knock monsters off the ledge before they do the same to you. The Gauntlet is a blaster equipped with shotgun chambers and a grapple, so it shouldn't be too hard, right?

Survive as long as you can and set a high-score for the leader boards!
